============
Installation
============

Firstly you need to clone the `repository <https://github.com/danifranco/DeepLearning_EM>`_: :: 

    git clone --recursive https://github.com/danifranco/DeepLearning_EM.git 

To set-up a development environment with all necessary dependencies, you can use the file located in `env/DL_EM_base_env.yml <https://github.com/danifranco/DeepLearning_EM/blob/master/env/DL_EM_base_env.yml>`_ to create a conda environment as follows: ::

    conda env create -f DL_EM_base_env.yml
